ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 240
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry for the triple posts... my news server told me they didnt go thru :( ... little ... I try it, every night.  Cleric stuns DO break mez, because they do
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry for the triple posts... my news server told me they didnt go thru :(

>
> >Um... if the stun does no damage, mes isn't broken. This includes the
> >colour series- shows that they are stunned, but sit there like happy
little
> >campers....
>
> Color series break mes... stuns break mes. Try it.
>
I try it, every night. Cleric stuns DO break mez, because they do damage.
Wizzy stuns are the same there, I think. I have NEVER had a color flux
break my mezzes. Last night I mezzed a Lava Duct Crawler which was all
alone, and immediately color fluxed it, stunning it. I did this completely
for the purpose of having an example for you. after about 20 seconds I
color fluxed again. after about 30 more seconds I let my group tear it
apart. Color Flux does not break mez.

Cogg - RZ
